mainText:
The first computer I ever laid hands on was an Apple II.  The first 
computer program I ever wrote was on an Apple IIe.  While I never had 
the pleasure of knowing Steve, he certainly had an effect on my life 
through his vision and ingenuity.  I am truly saddened by the news of 
Steve's passing and send my sincerest condolences to Steve's family and 
friends.  Today the world has lost one of the most amazing minds it has 
ever known.
author: Mike
